text: my Q&A this is a series of short films
they're about four minutes long where I
answer the sort of question that we all
ask ourselves whether to embarrass to
ask in public like why actually is a
diamond priceless and why do I have a
niche and can I ever be invisible that
sort of thing why not send your
questions in if they're any good I'll
answer them or if they're not very good
or I don't actually know the answer then
I'll just quietly discard them and
pretend I never notice them anyway why
not subscribe then you'll know if your
